ServiceSupervisor - Class in counter.aggregators
The ServiceSupervisor (aggregator) aggregates all the events about counter increases sent to it by CounterChangedWatchers and ensures that the ServiceComponents are synchronized to the correct value.

StartManager - Class in counter.managers
This class is responsible for initializing the system by deploying all the management elements, creating the ServiceComponents group, binding the element with the interfaces that they will use to make calls and subscribing management elements to events.
